attributes.action: Change the speed limit on Brookfield lane in Aughton from 60 mph to 30 mph
attributes.additional_details: There is a blind corner at Brookfield house and cars driving 60 mph are caught out when the speed limit changes to 30 mph abruptly. There is no pavement and pedestrians and residents of the houses are often in danger as cars come speeding round the bend. There is going to be a fatal accident as the road is very poorly lit in this area and 60 mph is far too fast in a residential area.
attributes.background: Change the speed limit from 60 mph to 30 mph on Brookfield lane for the whole lane. It changes at the bend of Brookfield house.

rejection.details:
